sections.comments: Peer TeachingRegistration by Application: Send a resume and letter of interest (max. 1 page) to Tony Seet (tony.seet@ubc.ca) and Jon Grosshuesch (jon.grosshuesch@ubc.ca).The course coordinators will provide information about the actual classroom dates, times and location at the beginning of termPlease note that all PHAR 404 Term 1 sessions will be delivered online for 2020W.
